trans-unit.source: An HTTP message contains an <languageKeyword>AtomPub</languageKeyword> entry describing the filter expression against which the messages sent to the topic are evaluated.
trans-unit.target: An HTTP message contains an <languageKeyword>AtomPub</languageKeyword> entry describing the filter expression against which the messages sent to the topic are evaluated.

trans-unit.source: Optionally, it can describe an action that can be taken on the message if the filter evaluation succeeds.
trans-unit.target: Optionally, it can describe an action that can be taken on the message if the filter evaluation succeeds.

trans-unit.source: All available rules attributes are documented in <link xlink:href="35db3b6d-1620-4c06-a850-1420517d025a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Rule Description</link>.
trans-unit.target: All available rules attributes are documented in <link xlink:href="35db3b6d-1620-4c06-a850-1420517d025a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Rule Description</link>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the description for the specified rule.
trans-unit.target: Retrieves the description for the specified rule.

trans-unit.source: Enumerates the rules that exist under the specified subscription.
trans-unit.target: Enumerates the rules that exist under the specified subscription.

trans-unit.source: The rule description is an XML <languageKeyword>AtomPub</languageKeyword> document that defines the desired semantics for a rule.
trans-unit.target: The rule description is an XML <languageKeyword>AtomPub</languageKeyword> document that defines the desired semantics for a rule.

trans-unit.source: The rule description contains the following properties.
